title: Passion fruit, rhubarb and granola muffins

ingredients.item: 200g slender rhubarb stems, cut into 1cm pieces

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 190°C, gas mark 5; line 9 holes of a muffin tin with cases. Scoop the passion fruit pulp into a mixing bowl and, using a fork, beat with the yogurt, oil, egg and vanilla. Stir in the flour, brown sugar and baking powder until half combined, then fold in the rhubarb and 2 tbsp granola. (Don’t overmix as you’ll end up with tough muffins; the odd lump won’t matter.)

Divide the mixture between the muffin cases, then sprinkle the remaining granola over the top. Bake for about 25 minutes, or until the tops feel springy and the muffins have puffed up into little toadstools. They are best served warm.
